thread.title: Wilmette woman hospitalized after Winnetka crash involving Pace bus - Winnetka Talk
thread.title_full: Wilmette woman hospitalized after Winnetka crash involving Pace bus - Winnetka Talk

author: Brian L. Cox
title: Wilmette woman hospitalized after Winnetka crash involving Pace bus - Winnetka Talk
text:
Winnetka police on Thursday continued to investigate an accident in which an 86-year-old woman making a U-turn on Green Bay Road ran into a Pace bus, then rammed a storefront, authorities said.
The driver of the car, from Wilmette, was hospitalized, but no passengers on the Pace bus were seriously injured following the Tuesday crash in the 0 to 100 block of Green Bay Road shortly after 10 a.m., authorities said.
Police said the driver was facing south on Green Bay Road when she made a U-turn to head north when her SUV collided with the Pace bus traveling north on Green Bay Road. The woman's car then deflected into a storefront, causing minor damage to the building. Police said the female driver's medical condition was not available and said no one on the bus was seriously injured.
Winnetka police on Thursday said the driver of the SUV was ticketed for improper U-turn and failure to wear a properly adjusted seatbelt.
Brian Cox is a freelance reporter for Pioneer Press.
